messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=255aa6fe61f7&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa/interp: add missing "external" (fix build)

R=adonovan, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12898043

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/12898043/diff/2/ssa/interp/external.go
File ssa/interp/external.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/12898043/diff/2/ssa/interp/external.go#newcode155
ssa/interp/external.go:155: // TODO(adonovan): do equivalent of calling runtime_Syncsemcheck(size uintptr) here
A no-op is fine.  I'll do that in a follow-up.

subject: code review 12898043: go.tools/ssa/interp: add missing "external" (fix build)
